dict.acceptation: 主管人员；统治者，管理者；<美>州长；[机]节速器，调节器；

sent.orig: This new type of digital speed governor is developing direction of speed governor of water turbine.
sent.trans: 这种数字逻辑式水轮机调速器将是今后水轮机调速器的发展方向。

sent.orig: I 1110, 1105,195 plant long-term supply of engine production FRP governor stent, governor levers, Speed Skating-tune.
sent.trans: 我厂长期生产供应1110、1105、195柴油机玻璃钢调速支架，调速杠杆，调速滑盘。

sent.orig: The state's new governor says Governor Ryan's decision was a big mistake.
sent.trans: 新任长官说，赖安的决定是个很大的错误。

sent.orig: You can see a governor, soon will be the former governor serving up some hot-dogs, hamburgers.
sent.trans: 你会看到，很快会变成前任市长，端着一些热狗和汉堡包。

sent.orig: This system of speed governor adopts the way of VVVF speed governor.
sent.trans: 其中，它的拖动系统采取的是最具有发展潜力的VVVF调速方式。
